item.title: Complete Guide to Harden Windows with Windows Defender Application Control (WDAC)
item.category: "Windows Defender Application Control (WDAC) Hardening" , "PowerShell" , "PowerShell Script" , "Automation" , "Compliance" , "Blue-Team" , "Windows Defender STIG Script" , "Windows Defender Hardening" , "Windows Defender STIG" , "Defender STIG" , "Windows Defender Exploit Protection (WDEP)" , "Windows Defender Attack Surface Reduction (ASR)" , "Windows Server 2016/2019" , "Windows Server Core" , "Microsoft WDAC-Toolkit" , "Refresh CI Policy" , "Microsoft Recommended block rules" , "Microsoft Recommended driver block rules" , "XML policies" , "BIN policies" , "Group Policy" , "Microsoft Intune"
